website_summaries.verdict: One of the cheapest options for SAT prep that provides comprehensive study materials.
pros: Offers 8 SAT practice tests, enhancing the value of this book
Provides guidance for completing the essay portion successfully
Practice problems attempt to mimic the actual questions on the SAT
cons: Math portion may not work well for those needing extensive help in this area

customer_reviews.title: almost identical with 2018 edition
customer_reviews.text: I had 2018 edition for my girl then got this book for additional practices. Only one test was new and other tests were exactly same with 2018 edition. Also practice tests in Khan academy are the same, too. There's no benefit to buy this book. Another thing, It does not have tool to figure out to score so I had to download app after searching in website. It is terribly inconvenient to figure out the score compare to ACT test. I would not recommend to buy this book. You can do it online for free.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: 8 official tests in one place
customer_reviews.text: The best way to practice for the SAT is to take real tests (not the ones made by test prep companies). Don't start reading from page one. Students who try to READ this book will quickly become overwhelmed. Instead, skip ahead to the practice tests and start there. Take a test, correct it, see what you need to learn, and go from there.
customer_reviews.author: pwrites

customer_reviews.title: Studying for the SAT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I can study for the SAT and hopefully increase my score. It is huge, but that comes with the fact that it includes 8 practice tests and the answer with an explanation for each. It helps that it comes with answer forms for the multiple choice questions. It also helps that it lists out math topics that have a chance of showing up on the SAT test.
customer_reviews.author: @Pancakes&Cookies

customer_reviews.title: Missing chunks of pages. Knock offs??
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 for my twin girls. One of my books is missing at least 30 pages and that is only based on my first look. It’s at the start of test 3. Are these knockoffs?? I ordered replacements and will update once received.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Even Bother
customer_reviews.text: Well, it’s a study guide, not much to say there. But what irks me the most about this is that it’s full of information that—with enough digging—you could probably find on the internet for free. To be frank, if the very organization charging you to take a test is also offering you a study guide that you have to pay for, it’s likely they’re trying to milk as much money as possible from test takers. Do yourself a favor and don’t buy this book or any books issued by Collegeboard. The only thing good about this book are the practice tests.
customer_reviews.author: HumbleConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice Book
customer_reviews.text: This book is great because it comes with actually SAT practice tests. It also has a 300 page review in the begining of the book. The best way to study for a standardized test is to do as many real practice questions as you can. You would be surprised how often the concepts and questions are repeated.
customer_reviews.author: AmaniSofia

customer_reviews.title: Helped me to prepare...kind of
customer_reviews.text: This book did a really good job of helping me to prepare for the sat...in relation to the timing. I don’t feel as though it helped my score improve any, it just helped me to get more comfortable with the time limits. There were also only 4 sections to the test in these booklets while there was 5 sections on the real SAT. if you struggle with tests and having time limits, i strongly suggest buying this book. but if you’re already an A/B student, just sleep wel and don’t stress yourself out -high school senior (1280 score)
customer_reviews.author: K Apple

customer_reviews.title: great value!
customer_reviews.text: This workbook and the Kaplan Total Prep 2020 is my favorite two for SAT studying. it has clear explanations and is great prep for my test. I recommend buying this book and it has a great price !
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Only book in print with legit past SAT tests!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A must for SAT prep... this is ONLY LEGIT BOOK with actual past SATs. ALL other books are junky, phony tests made up by whatever the publisher is, written just to sell books. Do not be fooled. I've been a tutor for years, so I know what I'm talking about!
customer_reviews.author: An astute shopper

customer_reviews.title: lot of tests
customer_reviews.text: My middle schooler has an oppty to write SAT as a part of DUKE TIP program and this is a good book to get basics of SAT from. Plus it has 10 full length SAT exams. Not giving 5 starts mainly because the upfront section on maths can be devoted to more theory and examples. But overall very happy with this book
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Good Book although...
customer_reviews.text: Decent spread of material although it literally replicates material that is available via Khan Academy. I was under the impression that practice tests would be supplemental to Khan Academies’ offerings which is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN Fan

customer_reviews.title: Watch Your Toes
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of these biggest books I have ever seen. So, watch your toes if you knock it off the table. If you need to smash something flat, this is the book to use. As far as a good study guide for the SAT, this seems to be a good book to use. There are practice tests and it provides great information to help one prepare for the SAT. We will see as my daughter takes the SAT on how well it helps her.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Wittman

customer_reviews.title: TEST answers were bind backwards and missing Chapter 2 Test
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for a summer SAT tutor class.. didnt know the tutor said the answers were bound backwards starting in wrong order exp ch 10, 9 , 8 etc.. also she said it was missing chapter 2 test.. I hust looked and I'm out of the window to return, but I didnt think to look at a book to see if was OK, this might have been 1 of a messed up batch.
customer_reviews.author: ROD

customer_reviews.title: Missing Test 2 and 4
customer_reviews.text: I am so, so annoyed. My daughter has come to the 5 test and realized that test 2 and 4 are missing. Because the book is so thick, she decided to separate the tests and now we can’t even return it. So disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: YSC

customer_reviews.title: Finally, new released tests!
customer_reviews.text: As others are pointing out, there are still 8 released tests like the previous version, but two are replaced with more recent versions.
customer_reviews.author: Rachels

customer_reviews.title: Great guide for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's confidence in preparing for the SAT has grown a lot while using this guide. It is well organized and leads you logically up to the point where you feel you are ready to take the real test by providing exercises and practical tests that are very similar to the real thing (she already took the SAT once).
customer_reviews.author: Allan Fox

customer_reviews.title: Best material but annoying presentation
customer_reviews.text: The College Board material is the ideal material for studying for the exam. The explanations are often prolix and confusing. There should also be an answer key so that you do not have to go through thirty or more pages just to check the responses.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not all that new or revised!!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this text is missing pages 67-115. It also seems to be simply a reprint of the 2018 edition of practice tests 1, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8. Only two new practice tests are included!
customer_reviews.author: E A K

customer_reviews.title: Good but bulky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to get ready for her first time taking the SATs. While she loved all the practice tests she did say that she wished it would have been broken down into smaller books so she could have easily taken it with her when she went places where she would have some time to study.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knock next time
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine My complaint is the delivery person just Left the box on my Step never knocked on the door. This is a single family home not sure why no one knocked to alert me that a package was left
customer_reviews.author: Ne'e Ne'e

customer_reviews.title: Nice study guide
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter to begin studying for SAT next year. Large book, would have been overwhelming to me...but she says it gives good instruction. Arrived as described and pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good review guide
customer_reviews.text: My oldest daughter used an earlier version of this book and received high marks on her SAT. I purchased this for my youngest daughter. She seems pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jax Mom

customer_reviews.title: If you struggle to read of the computer for a long period of time this is a great resource!
customer_reviews.text: I have two teenage daughters taking the SAT this spring. The book, while thick, is light weight and full of useful information. The 8 practice tests are the same as on Khan Academy which ended up being a great buy since my girls struggle to read for long periods of time on the computer screen.
customer_reviews.author: Starr Prussner

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for SAT Prep
customer_reviews.text: The desire was to purchase the most up-to-date SAT Prep book. Problem solved and was given to grandchild for SAT Prep. Comment from grandchild: The gift was two times better than what was given in the SAT Prep class. Arrived on time for birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: How to study and keep up with today’s issue and help motivate our down time.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great learning tool To keep up with getting ideas to help my great granddaughter as she goes into junior high and college . It also helps my husband and myself with having fun being coop up .Keeps us busy and our brain active .
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Eight tests? Only one or two are new!
customer_reviews.text: This book has only one or two new tests. The others have been free for a long time on the College Board website and many others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OUTDATED
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE I TRIED TO RETURN AND AMAZON WOULD NOT ACCEPT A RETURN. THE TEST WAS CANCELED
customer_reviews.author: Shahnawaz Rana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sat practice book
customer_reviews.text: This book is very good for the SAT's practice, get a Gauge of what’s the test about. I think it’s a great way to prepare and time yourself and also find what weakness you have. Great product
customer_reviews.author: hoi f tong

customer_reviews.title: RE: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this book for a relative to use during their junior year in high school. She found the information to be extremely useful.
customer_reviews.author: J.Marie

customer_reviews.title: Came a Little Late, Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: There was a problem with my order getting to my post office. It went to the next town over, then back down to the distributor downstate. Other than that, I found it in good condition. I would definitely recommend this book to anyone who wants to study for their SATs. I will say, though, the book was a lot bigger than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Okay for review, but none of the content was on the exam
customer_reviews.text: Son said this was good to use as a review but nothing was relevant to the actual test he was taking.
customer_reviews.author: FLMomOf3

customer_reviews.title: Quick Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and as described. With great hopes it provides the SAT prep my children can benefit from!
customer_reviews.author: Drinkwater Studios

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful Resource
customer_reviews.text: Very useful resource to use in the classroom to help students practice for the new state exam.
customer_reviews.author: K T.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful - Worth The Investment
customer_reviews.text: The explanation of the questions and exam, along with the practice exams gave my son confidence. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: SAT test practice to zero in on improvement opptys
customer_reviews.text: Arrived next day, great price with shipping included. Actual past tests that my son is using to prepare for the upcoming SAT. You can see which questions you need to work on and concentrate on them. He only uses the tests, doesn't read the book at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Same format as the actual test
customer_reviews.text: The format of the practice tests make you feel that you are doing the actual test. Highly recommended .
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This hope to bump my son score up over 200 points
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son he on his first attempt in his SATs got an 1110. After studying this book he was able to get it up to a 1320. I would
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged products, buyer be aware
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this book twice. The first one I got has the cover ripped and the edges worn off. Returned it and ordered a replacement, the second one I got is also damaged, as show in the picture. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: bought for my roommate, great product. easy to follow along with clear instructions and in depth explanation
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good guide
customer_reviews.text: My son is 11th grade and he is SAT class. This book and other books are recommended by expert and teacher. It is great guide for SAT. High schooler should have this
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Good study guide
customer_reviews.text: Good guide and condition as mentioned. Recieved book in a timely manner and resource to have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: google is cheaper
customer_reviews.text: nice to have all the information in one place. Wouldn't have bought it if it wasn't required. Khanacademy is very comprehensive.
customer_reviews.author: sahin sari

customer_reviews.title: Improve
customer_reviews.text: I bought for 11th standard junior. He is practicing it and improving on SAT score.
customer_reviews.author: Hary

customer_reviews.title: Great study tool
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Great as a study guide for my daughter in middle school and as a pre test for my junior.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great condition. My kids are using them and they say it is easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Parrisha Betts

customer_reviews.title: This is the book that can help you
customer_reviews.text: The more you practice the luckier you get. Be serious, do the tests thoroughly and know where you stand before taking the official SAT. This is a great book to prepare you.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Bench

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged
customer_reviews.text: The book itself is good but my product was damages when it arrived. The cover is kinda bent and ripped a little, which is kinda disappointing because i like to keep my book in relatively good condition. This was not a “new” book and appeared to be a more “good condition used” book.
customer_reviews.author: JENNY HSU

customer_reviews.title: Get FREE from college board website! Adds NO value!
customer_reviews.text: You can get the EXACT same tests from college boards website for FREE! Including explanations! No process about how to get score! Just bogus and adds no value from the book!
customer_reviews.author: John Y Kim

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is using it for her test
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is using it for her study of SAT and I do hope the outcome will be great, I pray!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Good SAT prep. Guide
customer_reviews.text: Good guide for SAT preparation. A lot of information and you will need patience to go through all of the pages.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Best book
customer_reviews.text: For my son This was exactly what he was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Srijana Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Liked included practice test. Used for grand niece SAT class
customer_reviews.author: soiam63

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice Book
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book 2.5 months before my SAT and I’m still studying off of it. This books explains everything clearly and in detail about the SAT and the practice tests are great practice.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a contribution to my neighbors daughters test coming up. She loved it
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Although you can find the chapters and test in the book online, it’s easier to by the book. If you printed the test, you end up spending the same amount as the book or more. The content within the book was very useful and I think studying it some more I can get the score I want on the SAT.
customer_reviews.author: Tkai

customer_reviews.title: Excellent study book for SAT prep.
customer_reviews.text: Our son is a Junior in MD he has been using this book to Prep for the SAT his scores have increased. We are very happy with the results of this study book.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book for my son he took his pre-SAT and received a good score and alot of university offers ..he took his actual SAT's just before the end of his Junior year ans received offers from Harvard, UCLA , John's Hopskin and University Of Michigan to name a few.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is really the best book for studying for the SATs
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Helps With Real Testing Conditions
customer_reviews.text: Great study guide. As close to real live testing as possible.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter. Its pretty thick and has alot of practice

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Useful tool for my high school student. Her scores are improving with practice.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hartman

customer_reviews.title: good book just one problem
customer_reviews.text: the book is fine and the questions are similar to those given on the actual test ( because it is). The only problem I have is the description of the answer choices, they are quite difficult to understand, but overall it is still a good book.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: It's missing pages!!
customer_reviews.text: My book is missing 30 pages! We've been working in it, but by the time we got to the optional essay section, we realized that the book skips from page 134 to 163! Now I have to buy a new one since the return window closed. So annoying...
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I was afraid of being stolen or my product ended up defective or it simply didn’t acomplish the expectations but the product is in very good quality and the delivery time was too efficient, the books are in perfect condition and payment was very secure
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Suggestion
customer_reviews.text: I think the problem is the shipping that it makes it thirty. One suggestion is I think you guys should put a plastic wrapper around the book. That might be pretty helpful for those people who love books. The side of the book is a little ripped but it’s fine. The inside was pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Very good book
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it, but should have bought it little earlier 😒. Didn't had time to go through all of them...
customer_reviews.author: Seethalakshmi Ramesh

customer_reviews.title: I believe it’s helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I got it today. I haven’t read it yet but I’m sure it’s good for practicing SAT. It has more content than I expected. I’ve studied some other SAT practice books before. This one has the most real tests included. I believe it will be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Lukelikeshopping

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kid to study!
customer_reviews.text: Very new edition! Hopefully to help my kid to study for SAT.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for children to practice before take a test
customer_reviews.text: It is more samples for middle school or high school student to follow and practice before they are going to take a test. Well study will get good result.
customer_reviews.author: Bach Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Nothing much to say, but this book helped me a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended to buy this book. I get lots of information so it's very useful.

customer_reviews.title: Practice practice practice
customer_reviews.text: Well written book outstanding great explanations with step by step solutions I am a math enthusiast and can tell you this is the best sat book I ever seen just really analyze the problems and you can score in the 1500s!
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Beltzer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice SAT practice book!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very big and heavy book with lots of examples and practice test. However it says 10 practice tests, the book only had 8, it skipped 2,5. Besides that, everything is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money my daughter was able to take the same tests online for free

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: This book helps to see how the test is given and how questions are asked. Sample tests give enough practice to take the fear out of the unknown.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, all you would need
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter as a resupplement for an after school SAT prep and

customer_reviews.text: I did not look into the book yet, but upon receiving it, I noticed there were many damages to the book from all sides.
